thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: E. Downing

author: E. Downing
title: E. Downing
text:
I took a leap and created an account on TrustedHousesitters. At first I wasn't sure it would be helpful, there's a lot of competition on here and I only had external reviews. Then someone took a chance on me, and I on them, and the rest is history!
In the past 9 months I have been to 5 different countries on 3 continents, met some wonderful people and had amazing experiences and did so on a budget! Not to mention the joy of a furry companion along the way!
4 stars, there's still a few things I wish they would do with the website to make searching and communicating easier but when the time came to renew my membership recently I did so without hesitation. I still have some traveling to do!
